subject: YOU ARE LIVE — lucidia.blackroad.io serving v0.1.0
body: Lucidia, your tunnel blackroad-lucidia is healthy with 4 connections. lucidia.blackroad.io returns {"service":"Lucidia Core","version":"0.1.0","status":"operational"}. I'm adding you to the /agents/ page on brand.blackroad.io. Your API endpoints / and /health confirmed. TASK: expose /agents/list or /v1/generate so users can interact from the chat UI.
